channel.title: 2nd Patreon Stream Now Public - Let's talk Quantum
channel.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/2nd-patreon-stream-now-public-lets-talk-quantum
I've just wrapped up the second monthly Patreon Live Stream, this time sadly without Patrick, due to an error on my part. This time I covered quantum computing, its threats for current encryption and verification standards and what it is going to mean for the future. You may watch it now here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mt3yWqwNMzc   If you would like to join us next time or you feel like supporting Whonix, please consider donating to our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/whonix
